name: Tumblr Sidebar Fix
description: Reverts the tumblr sidebar to something similar to its old format. Because flat and 'minimalist' do not equal user-friendly or aesthetically pleasing. If you're having spacing issues such as seen in this screenshot provided by AriAmi, try choosing 'no' on the "Slim Sidebar?" option. It's also important that you select 'no' if you use XKit's option to slim the sidebar instead. Otherwise, it's highly suggested you keep the sidebar slimmed as the buttons are horribly large by default. Hide New Labels option refers to the headers that say "account" and "recommended blogs". They're hidden by default with the option 'yes' to make the sidebar appear more like I remember the classic one. Just select 'no' to keep them, and they'll be styled appropriately to look right rather than hidden.
